page.title: 14J.A.R.I.C.
page.content: {JARIC}stands for Joint Air Reconnaissance Intelligence Centre. About 500 R.A.F.,Navy,Army and civilian people work there. They look at photographs taken from the air.It is the{only place in {England}to do this.Cameras are in Harriers,Jaguars & Canberras.Soon the Tornado will have a camera in it. Their{badge}has a{lynx}on it.They chose a lynx because it has good eye-sight,like a camera.JARIC came to Brampton in 1957.In 1972 building work was done.There are now five buildings;one has machinery in,one is offices,three are to do with photography.More building is now being carried out.In May 1984{H.R.H. {Princess Margaret}visited JARIC.
